history.proof: intros net H. unfold lifted_leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong. intros h Htype. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "H" of type "msg_refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net" cannot be applied to the term "h" : "Net.name"

original: intros net H. unfold lifted_leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong. intros h Htype. specialize (H h). destruct Htype as [term Htype]. exists (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h)) term). exists (filter (fun e => eTerm e = term) (log (snd (nwState net h)))). split. - apply H. - split. + apply filter_all_same. + intros e Hin. apply filter_In in Hin. destruct Hin as [Heq Hin]. apply proj1 in Heq. auto.
